database.name: nr
database.detail: All GenBank + RefSeq Nucleotides + EMBL + DDBJ + PDB sequences (excluding HTGS0,1,2, EST, GSS, STS, PAT, WGS). No longer "non-redundant".

database.name: refseq_rna
database.detail: RNA entries from NCBI's Reference Sequence project.

database.name: refseq_genomic
database.detail: Genomic entries from NCBI's Reference Sequence project.

database.name: chromosome
database.detail: Complete genomes and complete chromosomes from the NCBI Reference Sequence project. It overlaps with refseq_genomic.

database.name: est
database.detail: Database of GenBank + EMBL + DDBJ sequences from EST Divisions.

database.name: est_human
database.detail: Human subset of EST.

database.name: est_mouse
database.detail: Mouse subset of EST.

database.name: est_others
database.detail: Subset of est other than human or mouse.

database.name: gss
database.detail: Genome Survey Sequence, includes single-pass genomic data, exon-trapped sequences, and Alu PCR sequences.

database.name: htgs
database.detail: Unfinished High Throughput Genomic Sequences: phases 0, 1 and 2. (Finished, phase 3 HTG sequences are in nr).

database.name: pat
database.detail: Nucleotides from the Patent division of GenBank.

database.name: pdb
database.detail: Sequences derived from the 3-dimensional structure records from Protein Data Bank.

database.name: alu
database.detail: alu repeat elements.

database.name: dbsts
database.detail: Database of GenBank+EMBL+DDBJ sequences from STS Divisions.

database.name: wgs
database.detail: A database for whole genome shotgun sequence entries.

database.name: env_nt
database.detail: Nucleotide sequences from environmental samples, including those from Sargasso Sea and Mine Drainage projects.

database.name: nr
database.detail: All non-redundant GenBank CDS translations + RefSeq Proteins + PDB + SwissProt + PIR + PRF.

database.name: refseq_protein
database.detail: RefSeq protein sequences from NCBI's Reference Sequence Project.

database.name: swissprot
database.detail: Lastest major release of the SWISS-PROT protein sequence database (no incremental updates).

database.name: pat
database.detail: Proteins from the Patent division of GenPept.

database.name: pdb
database.detail: Sequences derived from the 3-dimensional structure records from the Protein Data Bank.

database.name: env_nr
database.detail: Protein sequences from environmental samples.
